message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think you'd find it very useful. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $90 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $110. This product is high-quality and I'm confident you'll find it worth the price.
I understand that the product is high-quality, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
